buffer_handler module¶

buffer_handler.roll(tensor: None._VariableFunctions.tensor, rollover: int) → None._VariableFunctions.tensor¶

Roll over the first axis of a tensor

Parameters

  • tensor – tensor to be rolled over

  • rollover – index the roll over occurs

Returns

rolled over tensor

Return type

torch.tensor

buffer_handler.roll2(tensor: None._VariableFunctions.tensor, rollover: int) → None._VariableFunctions.tensor¶

Roll over the second axis of a tensor

Parameters

  • tensor – tensor to be rolled over

  • rollover – index the roll over occurs

Returns

rolled over tensor

Return type

torch.tensor
